page.title: 10Page 2
page.content: school uniform.The girls wear knee length skirts with a blouse or T-shirt and a jumper or cardigan.Most boys prefer trousers to shorts and a shirt or jumper. Whenever we have the chance we try to eat together as a family,but at breakfast we very rarely have the chance to do so.Emily and I go to the local Primary School in Worlaby,so we eat our breakfast together.It's normally beans or egg on toast with a cup of black tea or fruit juice.School starts at 8.55 and at 8.45 mum's still rushing about making our packup and Emily is still only half dressed.At the last minute I forget my money or trainers and everyones in a panic.When Emily's face is still plastered with beans I begin to think we will never be ready.
